about-marche: Lucky Marche conveys a new classic style that is feminine and sophisticated by adding eminent cutting, silhouette, and fabric to the classic style.
about-deuce: Taken from the word tie in tennis, Deuce reflects an optimistic meaning of another opportunity or hope that the brand pursues in everyday life. Simple, harmonious, pleasant design embodies Lucky Marcheâ€™s idea that good style is not standing out, but being remembered.
